Description.Text:
Modern, elegant and comfortable Hotel that opened its doors in 2005. Located 15 Min away from IFEMA Madrid Trade Fair Centre.
It has 225 rooms and junior suites, all of them completely air-conditioned and equipped with the latest technologies.
The Hotel also has: Restaurant and lobby bar, LCD TV, free sale, free safe box with capacity for a laptop, non smoking rooms, free internet connection via Wifi and cable in the whole building, rooms adapted for the handicapped,free fitness centre and SPA, hairdresser, 8 meeting rooms with natural day-light and private garage.
The Hotel defines a new concept of space, modernity, comfort ability, and spaciousness, innovation and elegance. The Hotel offers an incomparable environment so that guests meetings and business trips become a complete success.
Buffet Breakfast is not included.
The hotel provides facilities like Airport Transfer (only from hotel to the airport with cost), bay sitting service, banquet facilities, bar, beauty salon/ hairdresser, business centre, concierge, conference facilities, currency exchange, disabled facilities, doctor on call, dry cleaning, gym/ spa facilities, internet access-high speed, internet access-wireless, laundry service, lift/ elevator, lobby, non smoking rooms, parking facilities-at cost, reception, restaurant, room service, spa services (massage, facial, steam room, etc.)

The Hotel strategically located between 283 Arturo Soria street and M-30 North, 15 Min away from Ifema Madrid Trade Centre, and 5 Min. away from Chamartin train station, in a new business area in the north of Madrid.

Double/ Double for Single Use - Room with one double includes mini-bar, bath, free safety deposit box, flat TV, individual air conditioning and heating, bathroom amenities, pay-TV, satellite TV, hairdryer, Wake up service, Color TV, Disabled Facilities, Ensuite/ private bathroom, internet access, Jacuzzi/ whirlpool/ spa bath, laundry service, , modem/ data port connection, non smoking rooms, Pay-per-view movies, room service, safe in room, shared bathroom, telephone and free internet connection (Wifi and cable).
